Package com.nbkelly

Class Timer

java.lang.Object
com.nbkelly.Timer
public class Timer
extends Object
A runtime timer, which will be enabled if the enabled var is set.

The timer takes into account (or at least attempts to) the time spent processing within the timer. The timer can generate formatted output based on given input, which can be printed by other services.

The use of the 'enabled' var is primarily to facilitate debuging: if the timer is not enabled (ie when debugging will not take place), none of the pre-processing is done.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes a timer, which will be enabled if the enabled var is set.

  • Constructor Details

    • Timer

      public Timer​(boolean enabled)
      Initializes a timer, which will be enabled if the enabled var is set.

      The use of the 'enabled' var is primarily to facilitate debuging: if the timer is not enabled (ie when debugging will not take place), none of the pre-processing is done.

      Parameters:
      enabled - is this timer enabled?

  • Method Details

    • split

      public String split​(String message)
      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split.

      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split. Time that has been spent within the timer has been factored out.

      Parameters:
      message - the name of the event
      Returns:
      A string representing the event and the total time passed since the last split.
      Since:
      1.0

    • splitf

      public String splitf​(String message)
      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split.

      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split. Time that has been spent within the timer has been factored out. The time is formatted based on the input string

      Parameters:
      message - the name of the event
      Returns:
      A format string representing the event and the total time passed since the last split.
      Since:
      1.0

    • split

      public String split()
      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split.

      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since the last split. Time that has been spent within the timer has been factored out.

      Returns:
      A string representing the total time passed since the last split.
      Since:
      1.0

    • total

      public String total()
      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since this timer was enabled.

      Determines the total amount of time that has passed since this timer was enabled. Time that has been spent within the timer has been factored out.

      Returns:
      A string representing the total time passed.
      Since:
      1.0
